sentences.en: " Well, you can suit yourself, Mr. Wheeler,'said the proprietor.
sentences.cn: “ 那么, 你看着办吧, 惠勒先生. " 店主说.

sentences.en: " What a fish it was, " the proprietor said.
sentences.cn: “ 多大的鱼呀, " 饭店老板说.

sentences.en: " Which one is Mr. Lin, the proprietor? "
As registered proprietor, only the vendor can do so.
sentences.cn: 因为只有产权注册人即卖方方能启用相关条款.

sentences.en: Fabrizzio said to the cafe proprietor, " You know all the girls here, I'll bet.
sentences.cn: 法布里吉奥对酒店主人说: “ 我敢保证,这儿所有的姑娘你都熟悉.

sentences.en: For example, many states require a sole proprietor to use their own name for the business name unless they formally file another name as a trade name, or fictitious name.
sentences.cn: 举例来说，许多国家要求独资经营者使用自己的名称为业务名称，除非他们正式文件中有另一个名字作为商标名或化名。

sentences.en: He was the sole proprietor with total management control.
sentences.cn: 他是唯一业主，掌握全部管理权。

sentences.en: I am the proprietor of the company.
sentences.cn: 我是这个公司的经营者。

sentences.en: I've mentioned your name to the proprietor, and we're thinking of making you a forewoman.
sentences.cn: 我同老板说过了, 打算升你做管车.

sentences.en: It was the editor and proprietor of the SAGAMORE.
sentences.cn: 来人是《萨加摩尔周报》的编辑兼老板.

sentences.en: Marketing concept is the reflection of the marketing activity in the consciousness of the proprietor.
sentences.cn: 市场营销观念是市场营销活动在经营者意识中的反映。

sentences.en: Not applicable to self - employed person, sole proprietor or partner of partnership business.
sentences.cn: 不适用于自雇人士 、 独资经营人士或合夥业务的合夥人.

sentences.en: She meant the saloon; the proprietor also had rooms for rent upstairs.
sentences.cn: 她指的是酒店, 老板在楼上也有空房间出租.

sentences.en: The proprietor of the cafe came to serve them.
sentences.cn: 咖啡店的主人给他们端着吃的出来了.

sentences.en: The proprietor was an old acquaint-ance of his.
sentences.cn: 业主是他的一位旧相识。

sentences.en: The proprietor was an old acquaintance of his.
sentences.cn: 业主是他的一位旧相识。

sentences.en: There was an absurdly tiny shop whose proprietor was a member of the village panchayat.
sentences.cn: 有个小得可笑的店铺,老板是村自治委员会的成员.

sentences.en: They scrutinise unusual items and bring a proprietor's conscientious attitude to bear.
sentences.cn: 他们会详查异常项目,采取所有者的尽责态度.
